title: Is Hurricane Irma on track to become a category 6 storm?
subtitle: A rumor that scientists will create a new hurricane class for Irma has made people think that the storm has already got that name.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: It is expected that Hurricane Irma will be so large that it may become a category 6 hurricane that the new category 6 will be invented specifically for Hurricane Irma.
